column1: Little Goat Diner////1.) Mushrooms have no f****** place on biscuits and gravy. Now again
column2: the subtext in the menu says its a mushroom gravy
column3: but again i did not read that part
column4: which is my fault. What is not my fault is that the mushrooms were slimy
column6: and seemed to be added to simply be different with no attempt at adding something special and integral to the dish. It made the gravy crappy
column7: which otherwise would have been some decent gravy (gravy is a tough subject for fat people like myself).
